      com.google.gson.JsonObject GlobalLootModifierSerializer.makeConditions(ILootCondition[] conditions)
      Helper to create the json object from the conditions.
      abstract T GlobalLootModifierSerializer.read(ResourceLocation location, com.google.gson.JsonObject object, ILootCondition[] ailootcondition)
      Most mods will likely not need more than
      return new MyModifier(conditionsIn)
      but any additional properties that are needed will need to be deserialized here.
